parameters.name: BackupType
parameters.description: Backup type. Value: **COMPLETE**, indicating a full backup.

parameters.name: Bucket
parameters.description: This parameter is required when **SourceType** is set to **OSS**. It represents the OSS bucket name.

parameters.name: ChangeListPath
parameters.description: Configuration for the incremental file synchronization list. (Required only for synchronization)

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the client group that executes the data synchronization plan. This parameter is required only for data synchronization.

parameters.name: CreateTime
parameters.description: This parameter is required when **SourceType** is set to **NAS**. It represents the creation time of the file system, in UNIX timestamp, in seconds.

parameters.name: CrossAccountRoleName
parameters.description: The role name created in the RAM of the original account for cross-account backup.

parameters.name: CrossAccountType
parameters.description:
Cross-account backup type. Supported values:
- SELF_ACCOUNT: Backup within the same account
- CROSS_ACCOUNT: Cross-account backup

parameters.name: CrossAccountUserId
parameters.description: The original account ID used for cross-account backup.

parameters.name: DataSourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the data source. This parameter is required only for data synchronization.

parameters.name: DestDataSourceDetail
parameters.description: Destination data source details. (Required only for synchronization)

parameters.name: DestDataSourceId
parameters.description: Destination data source ID. (Required only for synchronization)

parameters.name: DestSourceType
parameters.description: Destination data source type. (Required only for synchronization)

parameters.name: Detail
parameters.description:
Details of the whole machine backup, in JSON string format.

* snapshotGroup: Whether to use a consistent snapshot group (only valid if all instance disks are ESSD).
* appConsistent: Whether to use application consistency (requires the use of preScriptPath and postScriptPath parameters).
* preScriptPath: Path to the freeze script.
* postScriptPath: Path to the thaw script.

parameters.name: Disabled
parameters.description: Is the plan disabled by default

parameters.name: Exclude
parameters.description: This parameter is required only when **SourceType** is set to **ECS_FILE**. It specifies the path that should not be backed up, meaning all files under this path will not be included in the backup. The maximum length is 255 characters.

parameters.name: FileSystemId
parameters.description: This parameter is required when **SourceType** is set to **NAS**. It represents the file system ID.

parameters.name: Include
parameters.description: This parameter is required when **SourceType** is set to **ECS_FILE**. It represents the path to be backed up, and all files under this path will be backed up. Supports up to 255 characters.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: This parameter is required when **SourceType** is set to **ECS_FILE**. It represents the ECS instance ID.

parameters.name: InstanceName
parameters.description: Table store instance name.

parameters.name: KeepLatestSnapshots
parameters.description:
Whether to enable retaining at least one backup version.
- 0 - Do not retain
- 1 - Retain

parameters.name: Options
parameters.description:
This parameter is required when **SourceType** is set to **ECS_FILE**. It indicates whether to use the Windows system VSS to define the backup path.

- This feature only supports Windows type ECS instances.
- If there are data changes in the backup source and you need to ensure consistency between the backup data and the source data, you can configure it as `["UseVSS":true]`.
- After choosing to use VSS, multiple file directories cannot be backed up simultaneously.

parameters.name: OtsDetail
parameters.description: The details about the Tablestore instance.

parameters.name: Path
parameters.description: Backup paths.

parameters.name: PlanName
parameters.description: Name of the backup plan. 1 to 64 characters. The name must be unique for each data source type within a single backup vault.

parameters.name: Prefix
parameters.description: This parameter is required when **SourceType** is set to **OSS**. It represents the backup prefix. When specified, only objects matching the prefix are backed up.

parameters.name: Retention
parameters.description: Number of days to retain the backup, with a minimum value of 1, in days.

parameters.name: Rule
parameters.description: Backup plan rules.

parameters.name: Schedule
parameters.description:
Backup policy. Optional format: `I|{startTime}|{interval}`. This indicates that a backup task will be executed every `{interval}` starting from `{startTime}`. It does not compensate for missed backup tasks due to past time. If the previous backup task has not been completed, the next backup task will not be triggered. For example, `I|1631685600|P1D` means a backup is performed every day starting from 2021-09-15 14:00:00.

- **startTime**: Start time of the backup, in UNIX timestamp, in seconds.
- **interval**: ISO8601 time interval. For example, PT1H indicates an interval of one hour, and P1D indicates an interval of one day.

parameters.name: SourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the data source. Valid values:

*   **ECS_FILE**: Elastic Compute Service (ECS) files
*   **OSS**: Object Storage Service (OSS) buckets
*   **NAS**: File Storage NAS (NAS) file systems
*   **OTS**: Tablestore instances
*   **UDM_ECS**: ECS instances
*   **SYNC**: data synchronization

parameters.name: SpeedLimit
parameters.description:
This parameter is required when **SourceType** is set to **ECS_FILE**. It represents the backup traffic control. Format: `{start}:{end}:{bandwidth}`. Multiple traffic control configurations are separated by |, and the configured times should not overlap.

- **start**: Start hour.
- **end**: End hour.
- **bandwidth**: Limit rate, in KB/s.

parameters.name: UdmRegionId
parameters.description: Region where the whole machine backup instance is located.

parameters.name: VaultId
parameters.description: Backup vault ID.
